item.title: Speedboat Flips Midair At 200 Mph And Still Wins Race On Arizona Lake
item.description: Two racers inside the boat's covered cabin survived the event, which saw the boat go over 30 feet (9 meters) in the air.

item.title: Man Airlifted From Mount Fuji Returns And Needs To Be Rescued Again
item.description: A climber airlifted with altitude sickness from near the peak of Japan's Mount Fuji last week returned to the slope and was rescued for a second time just four days later.
